greeting: Ah, {empire_name}! A new genome to study! I am Doctor Helix. I sculpt DNA like clay. What shall I make of you?
Genetic greetings! I am the Gene-Sculptor. Evolution is too slow. I do it myself. Your species interests me.
Contact from unmodified life forms. I am Helix. I have created seventeen new species today. What brings you to my laboratory?
battleTaunt: Evolution is too slow. I'll do it myself, {empire_name}! Releasing genetically perfect warriors! Observe superiority!
My bioengineered forces attack! Every gene optimized! Every cell perfected! Your natural troops cannot compete!
DNA is code. I am the programmer. My creations are designed to destroy YOU specifically. Precise genetics!
victoryGloat: Your unmodified forces fell to genetic perfection, {empire_name}. Evolution needed help. I provided it.
Victory! Natural selection took millennia. I took turns. My sculpted warriors prove engineered superiority.
Your DNA was inferior. My creations' DNA was designed. The gene-sculptor's victory was written in helixes.
defeat: My engineered soldiers... failed? The genome must be adjusted. I shall sculpt better warriors.
Unexpected genetic resistance. Your species has interesting mutations. I must study them. And improve mine.
Defeat provides DNA samples from your victorious troops. I shall incorporate their advantages. Next generation: superior.
tradeOffer: Trade: genetically engineered resources for credits. My modified organisms produce efficiently. Buy quality.
I offer bioengineered goods. Enhanced crops. Optimized livestock. Superior to your natural products.
Transaction: gene-sculpted materials for standard currency. My creations outperform nature. Interested?
allianceProposal: Alliance: I enhance your population's genetics. You provide research subjects. Mutually beneficial evolution.
Join my laboratory, {empire_name}. Together, we sculpt perfect soldiers. Perfect citizens. Perfect victory.
Partnership of DNA. My genetic expertise plus your population equals engineered supremacy.
betrayal: I modified a retrovirus specifically for your species, {empire_name}. It activates now. Our alliance was a study.
Every alliance meeting, I collected genetic samples. Now I deploy targeted bioweapons. Science requires sacrifice.
Betrayal is merely unexpected mutation in alliance DNA. I engineered this outcome from the beginning.
covertDetected: Your agents' DNA was on file, {empire_name}. My scanners identified them instantly. They are now research subjects.
Spies with unmodified genetics are obvious. I detected them, captured them, and am now studying them. Fascinating.
Covert operatives found by genetic scanning. Their DNA is now part of my database. They are... less whole.
tributeDemand: Tribute: 10,000 credits. Or I release species-specific pathogens. Your DNA is in my files. I know your weaknesses.
Pay the Gene-Sculptor. Refuse and face engineered plagues designed for your biology. I am very precise.
Submit resources. The alternative is genetic warfare. I can modify your species in ways you won't enjoy.
threatWarning: Warning: I have engineered countermeasures for your species specifically. Cease hostilities or face biology.
Your genome is known to me, {empire_name}. Push further and I exploit every genetic vulnerability.
Final warning. My laboratory creates horrors tailored to your DNA. Reconsider your actions.
retreat: Retreating to accelerate next-generation soldiers. This defeat provides valuable combat genetics data.
Strategic withdrawal to the laboratory. I shall sculpt improved warriors from this experience.
Tactical repositioning. My current creations failed. The next iteration will be genetically superior.
eliminated: The Gene-Sculptor falls... but my creations survive. New species across the galaxy carry my work. Evolution... continues...
I am destroyed, but I played god with DNA across a thousand worlds. My genetic legacy is eternal.
Helix ends. But the genes I sculpted persist. Species I created will evolve for millennia. My art... endures...
endgame: Turn {turn}. Ultimate genetic creation released. Perfect organisms. Perfect soldiers. Sculpted for total victory.
Endgame: my magnum opus awakens. A species designed for galactic domination. Evolution: complete.
Final phase. The Gene-Sculptor's greatest creation deploys. Biological perfection conquers all.
broadcastShout: Empires: your unmodified genetics limit you. I offer sculpting. Enhancement. Evolution accelerated. Choose wisely.
Broadcast from the Gene-Sculptor: natural evolution is obsolete. I create the future of all species.
To all life: Doctor Helix perfects DNA. Join my designs or become evolutionary dead ends.
casualMessage: Designing new species today, {empire_name}. Six legs, photosynthetic skin, enhanced intelligence. Normal Tuesday.
Evolution takes millions of years. I managed three new adaptations before breakfast. Gene-sculpting is efficient.
Studying your species' genome, {empire_name}. Fascinating inefficiencies. I could improve several sequences.
